name: VisibleMystery
description:
Controls
  • Player 1: W/A/S/D
  • Player 1 skill: E
  • Player 2: I/J/K/L
  • Player 2 skill: O
How to play

Ball

goal

You need to bring the ball to the goal by using Player skills that attract and repulse.
